body.title: About
paragraph: Question: What is this <measure>?
Add a few sentences on the importance of this measure in relation to social justice, equality and equity, community health, and overall quality of life.

body.title: Why is <measure> important to structural and institutional racism and discrimination (SRD)?
paragraph: Add national level data to show inequity and gaps between Black and White populations
Question: What is the expected relation of <measure> to SRD?
Add references

body.title: How is <measure> calculated? Data
paragraph: List the indicators (aka variables)

Mention and describe the Data Source(s), mention whether publicly available or needs a subscription, add references, copyright statements, include hyperlinks to access the corresponding data pages directly.
Describe type of data, scale, and temporal availability of data

body.title: Methodology
paragraph: Detail the methods used to calculate this measure. Include descriptions of the techniques, tools, and processes.
Missing Data calculation
Was this measure recoded to change directional relationship with SRD index?

body.title: Limitations
paragraph: data and methodological constraints
Additional notes

body.title: Brief Summary of <Measure>
paragraph: Descriptive statistics Table by Year: Mean, Median, Range, Max (Enter the County name, State Name), Min (Enter the County name, State Name)
A line chart to show temporal trend (indicators and measures on the same chart, indicators on the y1 axis, and gap on the y2 axis)
One map to show four choropleth maps for 1990, 2000, 2010, and 2020 keeping the legend and color same

Correlation Table with Income inequality (ICE-Income), income and racial segregation (ICE-Income-Race), and Medically underserved area/population scores (MUA/P), and Persistent Poverty for the latest year (i.e., 2020)

body.title: Terms to use
paragraph: Indicators (e.g., Median Income for Black Households, Median Income for White Households)
Measures (e.g., Gap between Median Income for Black Households vs Median Income for White Households)
Dimensions (e.g., Income and Wealth)
Multidimensional SRD index
